Html:
Hello:

I'm just wondering when a more official Prism v4.5 release will be available. The closest thing I see is one that just targets the .NET 4.5 framework, but really doesn't take advantage of a lot of things it offers. I remember seeing a roadmap that listed the release around Jan/Feb, but it's now halfway through March. Any updates on what issues are planning to be addressed and a timeline estimate? Thanks!
Waiting for the new PRISM 4.5 release as well :-)
Waiting for the new version as well. and expect it can run in windows 7.
We will ship an updated version of Prism shortly the latest version of Unity ships. This version will not have make any major changes.
Do you know if the latest version of Unity supports Portable Class Library?
I do not think so, but I will find out for certain.
